tasks.label: Boot: iOS 26.1 Simulator (EFB6DE5E)
args:
set -e

# Open Simulator app (no-op if already open)
open -a Simulator || true

# Boot specific simulator (iPhone 15 iOS 26.1)
xcrun simctl boot EFB6DE5E-C731-4801-B4CC-06B05C268D4C || true
# Wait until fully booted
xcrun simctl bootstatus EFB6DE5E-C731-4801-B4CC-06B05C268D4C -b

tasks.label: iOS: Boot simulator and run app
args:
set -e

# Open Simulator app (no-op if already open)
open -a Simulator || true

# Try get a booted device UDID
UDID=$(xcrun simctl list devices | awk '/Booted/{print $NF}' | sed 's/[()]//g' | head -n1)

if [ -z "$UDID" ]; then
  # Pick the first available iPhone simulator that is Shutdown
  UDID=$(xcrun simctl list devices | awk '/iPhone/ && /Shutdown/{print $NF}' | sed 's/[()]//g' | head -n1)
  if [ -z "$UDID" ]; then
    echo 'No available iPhone simulators found. Please create one in Xcode.'
    exit 1
  fi
  echo "Booting simulator $UDID"
  xcrun simctl boot "$UDID"
  # Wait until fully booted
  xcrun simctl bootstatus "$UDID" -b
else
  echo "Using already booted simulator $UDID"
  xcrun simctl bootstatus booted -b || true
fi

# Show devices for debug
flutter devices

# Run the app on the selected simulator
flutter run -d "$UDID"

tasks.label: iOS: Run on booted simulator
args:
set -e

# Get currently booted simulator UDID
UDID=$(xcrun simctl list devices | awk '/Booted/{print $NF}' | sed 's/[()]//g' | head -n1)
if [ -z "$UDID" ]; then
  echo 'No booted iOS simulator found. Please start Simulator first.'
  exit 1
fi

# Show devices for debug
flutter devices

# Run the app on the booted simulator
flutter run -d "$UDID"
